verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I cry out
For Your hand of mercy to heal me
I am weak
I need Your love to free me
Oh Lord my rock
My strength in weakness
Come rescue me oh Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my hope
Your promise never fails me
And my desire is to follow You forever.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For You are good
You are good
You are good to me
For You are good
You are good
You are good to me.
